docs.snippet: Hillary Clinton appealed to voting mothers Tuesday outlining ways she hopes to curb gun violence as president and provide paid family leave and sick days for struggling working moms. Donald Trump tried to blame his opponent about revelations that ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Hillary Clinton appealed to voting mothers Tuesday outlining ways she hopes to curb gun violence as president and provide paid family leave and sick days for struggling working moms. Donald Trump tried to blame his opponent about revelations that his massive financial losses could have allowed him to avoid paying federal income taxes for years.

headline.main: Clinton Reaches Out to Women While Trump Defends Taxes

docs.snippet: Cyberattacks from foreign governments “constitute one of our most critical national security concerns,” Mr. Trump told a group of military veterans in Virginia....
docs.lead_paragraph: Cyberattacks from foreign governments “constitute one of our most critical national security concerns,” Mr. Trump told a group of military veterans in Virginia.
docs.abstract: Donald Trump, during event with group of retired military veterans, calls for bolstering of country's defenses against cyberattacks and says he will create joint law enforcement task force to be in charge of cybersecurity as well as offensive cyberwarfare.

headline.main: Donald Trump Says a Strong Defense Against Cyberattacks Is Essential
headline.print_headline: Trump Vows to Bolster Cyberattack Defenses

docs.snippet: Across the country, spotty records and lax laws shield the financial interests of public officials, from presidential candidates on down....
docs.lead_paragraph: Across the country, spotty records and lax laws shield the financial interests of public officials, from presidential candidates on down.
docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by journalism professors John Wihbey and Mike Beaudet argues amount and quality of information about politicians' finances available to public isn't substantial enough to detect possible conflicts of interest; calls for stronger laws requiring elected officials to disclose their financial histories.

headline.main: Why It’s So Hard to See Politicians’ Financial Data

byline.original: By JOHN WIHBEY and MIKE BEAUDET
